bio: A visual artist interested in calligraphy, with a unique artistic style that combines elements of contemporary abstract expression and traditional calligraphy. Utilizing various techniques and materials, they create non-traditional and unique artworks. The artist has participated in numerous local and international art exhibitions, as well as organizing and contributing to various workshops and cultural and artistic activities.
